channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tubi’s Free Streaming Explodes in Popularity, Outranking Max and Apple TV+
item.description: Tubi has exploded in popularity over the past 18 months, outpacing some competitors with much bigger budgets.

item.title: Middle East Crisis: Palestinians Describe Dire Conditions in Gaza’s Shrinking ‘Humanitarian Zone’
item.description: An area of southern Gaza where Israel has directed hundreds of thousands of civilians to go has become a “hell” where food and water are scarce, people there say.

item.title: How Starbucks’ new CEO Brian Niccol went from fast-food Frankenstein to Chipotle’s redeemer
item.description: Niccol helped create Taco Bell’s mega-viral Doritos Locos Taco before leading Chipotle’s food safety crisis turnaround.

item.title: Arizona Will Vote on Abortion in November: Could That Give Democrats an Edge?
item.description: The battleground state will vote on establishing abortion rights in the state constitution. Democrats have used the issue to turn out voters all over the country.

item.title: Head of Panel That Ruled Against Jordan Chiles Represented Romania in Other Cases
item.description: The decision outraged U.S. Olympic and gymnastics officials, and led to a torrent of online abuse against both Chiles and Ana Barbosu, the Romanian athlete who ended up with the bronze.

item.title: I’m a Gen Zer starting a career in homebuilding. Skipping college was the best decision I ever made
item.description: College can bring success. It can also bring student debt and regret.

item.title: Head of Panel That Ruled Against Jordan Chiles Represented Romania in Other Cases
item.description: The decision outraged U.S. Olympic and gymnastics officials, and led to a torrent of online abuse against both Chiles and Ana Barbosu, the Romanian athlete who ended up with the bronze.

item.title: Ukraine’s Incursion Into Russia: What to Know
item.description: The incursion caught Russia by surprise and signified a shift in tactics for Kyiv after more than two years of war with Russia.

item.title: Ford and Mazda beg nearly 500,000 owners to stop driving older cars with deadly air bags
item.description: The warning covers more than 374,000 Ford, Lincoln and Mercury vehicles, as well as nearly 83,000 Mazdas.

item.title: The police say a man broke into a Trump campaign office in Virginia.
Why Iran Has Waited to Retaliate Against Israel for Hamas Leader’s Killing
item.description: Tehran is under pressure to avenge the assassination of Ismail Haniyeh, but analysts said it is balancing multiple factors as it weighs a response.

item.title: EU warns Elon Musk over X compliance—he fires back with vulgar ‘Tropic Thunder’ meme
item.description: The EU Commission forced to defend claims a strongly worded letter to Elon Musk was proof Brussels is interfering in U.S. elections.

item.title: Starbucks Names Chipotle’s Brian Niccol as New C.E.O.
item.description: The coffee chain said that Chipotle’s chief executive would replace Laxman Narasimhan, who is leaving the company after just over a year at the helm.

item.title: Israel Was Less Flexible in Recent Gaza Cease-Fire Talks, Documents Show
item.description: The country made five new demands, according to documents detailing its newest negotiating positions.

item.title: Starbucks poaches Chipotle CEO Brian Niccol in surprise leadership shake-up
item.description: Laxman Narasimhan was ousted after just over a year in the CEO role.
